data.actual_result: It immediately creates a new invite as soon as you change the target channel in the dropdown menu, which creates unnecessary invites and you can easily get ratelimited
data.expected_result: Changing channel should not create a new invite until "Generate link" button is pressed
data.short_description: New invite is created as soon as you change the target channel in invite settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Create instant invite screen - Tap the settings icon - Select a different channel in the dropdown menu - Select a different channel in the dropdown menu - Select a different channel in the dropdown menu - Select a different channel in the dr... ok I stop - Now go in Server Settings and look at the invite list to notice the results
